alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:28PM CST until February 17 at 2:35AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale, Marengo and Sumter Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the past several days will produce rises on the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. Another statement will be issued by Monday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to early Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 59.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday afternoon to a crest of 69.1 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
